name: Stack Defense
summary: Nice and funny multiplayer stacking-game. Play this Game with friends or alone. Stack as much as you can and protect your stack. User voice to communicate with other players. Create new rooms if all rooms are full. You can also customize your avatar. Remember, this game is still in developement. We are still working on some issues. We know there are some ;) We will not stop working on this game until its finished. Happy stacking!!!!
